alert.note: Alert for Bleckley; Dodge; Pulaski; Telfair; Wilcox (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 5:41AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Laurens, west central Toombs, Dodge, southeastern Pulaski, Telfair, Wilcox, south central Bleckley, Wheeler and Montgomery Counties through 630 AM EDT... At 541 AM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Gresston to near Cedar Creek to near Rebecca, and moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... McRae, Eastman, Abbeville, Alamo, Mount Vernon, Vidalia, Helena, Lumber City, Rochelle, Glenwood, Milan, Uvalda, Ailey, Rhine, Scotland, Chauncey, Higgston, Alston, Jacksonville and Union. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
